### Hey there!

I'm Nicole Pepper, a data scientist with a focus leveraging spatial and diverse datasets to tackle environmental challenges. When I'm not wrangling data, you'll find me enjoying the great outdoors, especially in the mountains. Take a look around to learn more about my work and the impact I'm striving to make.
